Body:
"""Test get_performance_stats recency check exception."""
one_hour_ago = self.time_now - pc.ONE_HOUR
self.assertRaises(exception.VolumeBackendAPIException, self.perf.
    get_performance_stats, category=pc.ARRAY, metrics='PercentBusy',
    array_id=self.p_data.array, start_time=one_hour_ago, end_time=
    one_hour_ago, recency=True)
